claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

rejected_evidence.quote: acell culture based influenza vaccine (Flu cel vax Quad rival ent by Seqirus, Inc., ccIIV4) and a recombinant influenza vaccine (Flublok Quad rival ent by SanofiPasteur, RIV4). RIV4 contains 3 times the i d 45 HA/d / ...d
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote identifies Flublok (RIV4) as a recombinant influenza vaccine, which is relevant because recombinant vaccines are not produced in eggs and thus avoid egg-adapted mutations, supporting the claim that Flublok ensures an identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

rejected_evidence.quote: The purified and trim eric recombinant HA proteins were expressed from the baculo virus system using the established procedures 45.
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote explains that the hemagglutinin (HA) proteins in Flublok are produced using a recombinant baculovirus system, which allows for the production of HA proteins that are antigenically identical to the reference strains selected by WHO and FDA, supporting the claim.
